summary: Replaces/removes the \"Skirts\" from most male armors
descriptionHtml:
This is a REPLACER for existing meshes/textures ... You have been warned!

I mainly use replacers in game simply because, I like to see my work on OTHER characters and creating standalone versions and then adding them to the leveled lists in Skyrim is a pain in the a**. But if someone wants to do standalone versions feel free.

I have an idea for a mod to add a \"Store\" to one of the towns ... \"Pants R Us\" or \"Masculinus Vestis\" So a \"Gentleman Dovakiin can find suitable attire to replace that \"skirt\" with

(my twisted mind is imagining a Breton version of Julian Clary, behind the counter ... \"Hmm yes, DO let me size you up\" sir) ... Anyway

After reading a suggestion from a member I decided to post the rest of my \"Skirtless Male Armors\" in one place.

This collection is by no means finished as their is still a couple of armors to do, but at the moment this is what I have.

There MAY be revisions and updates in the future for these armors, depending on what feedback I get from you guys. I can\'t promise anything instantly, but any major issues, I will try and sort out quickly

I currently have a very disorganized collection of modded armors for both male and female toons, and I\'m trying to get them sorted, plus I have a couple of mod request projects I\'m working on, but I WILL always check here for comments and suggestions.

I\'ve tried to stay as close as possible to original with these, by using existing meshes/textures where possible and creating custom textures and adding mesh components when not.

The other armors in the collection are here:

Hide = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23579
Iron = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23665
Bandit= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23670
Nord Plate = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23669
Daedric = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23703
Ancient Nord = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23754
Dragonbone = http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23756

The textures are not \"High Def\" and please don\'t ask for for a \"HD\" version, but they are as detailed and as close to the original textures as I can make them.
If someone wants to create a HD version, feel free.

I also DO NOT have any skills with Blender or MAX so these are done purely with Nifskope and Paint.net, which means I probably won\'t be able to \"Add this, take out that, put that there and swap that for this\" But if you do have a request you can still post it and I MAY be able to do it.

Just to reiterate, these are MALE ONLY, as I feel there is already enough female variants out there, but If I get enough requests I MAY try and do something similar for the female version.

There may be some minor clipping errors here and there with certain animations, I haven\'t tested these out exhaustively in game, but in most situations they seem to work OK

!!! Again, Any bugs or major issues PLEASE let me know POLITELY, and I\'ll try and sort them out !!!

Credit/thanks to:
Bugthesda
The Niftools Team
Paint.net
The Nexus for letting us run free with our imaginations
author: Perraine
